daily.template: Today's card is {{cardName}}. It suggests: {{cardMeaning}}. Use this insight to guide your day.

pastPresentFuture.template: Your reading reveals: In your past, you experienced '{{Past}}'; currently, you are facing '{{Present}}'; and your future holds '{{Future}}'.

Card2.description: Shows the main challenge you face.

Card3.description: Reveals the foundation or underlying issue.

Card4.description: Reflects recent events that influence you.

Foundation.description: The basis or core of your relationship.

Challenges.description: The obstacles or issues you face.

general.intro: Welcome to your tarot reading. The cards you draw provide guidance and insight into various aspects of your life.
general.conclusion: Remember, the tarot offers reflections on your circumstancesâ€”but you always have the power to shape your destiny.

keywords.transformation: Signifies significant changes or a period of transformation.
keywords.challenge: Points to obstacles that may need to be overcome.
keywords.love: Reflects emotional connections and matters of the heart.

combinations.The Fool, The Magician: This combination suggests that you have both the potential and the drive to begin a bold new journey.
combinations.Death, Temperance: A strong sign that transformation, when balanced with moderation, can lead to profound personal growth.
combinations.The Lovers, Justice: Indicates that matters of the heart are being weighed with fairness and truth, guiding you toward balanced decisions.
